meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points that are reached at the same time by a moving object.
meanings.sent1: The isochrones on the map show where the car will be at the same time.
meanings.sent2: We used isochrones to plan the fastest route to our destination.
meanings.sent3: The isochrones on the map looked like colorful ribbons dancing together.
meanings.sent4: The isochrones acted as a magical thread connecting all the points in time.
meanings.sent5: The concept of isochrones made it easier to visualize the movement on the map.

meanings.definition: A curve on a graph representing points that are reached at the same time by a moving object.
meanings.sent1: The isochrones on the graph helped us analyze the motion of the object.
meanings.sent2: The scientist plotted the isochrones to study the speed variations.
meanings.sent3: The isochrones on the graph seemed to be having a race against each other.
meanings.sent4: The isochrones intertwined like a complex dance of time and space.
meanings.sent5: The isochrones on the graph painted a vivid picture of simultaneous points.
